channel.title: Line preventing server from running
channel.description:
Whenever I add this line [code]private FOG fog = new Fog(this);[/code] to my Client.java, the server no longer allows any clients to connect. Is it a problem with the line, or with the file FOG.java, and if it is a problem with the line and you know how to fix it, may you point me in the right direction.
PS:The line is for a mini-game that I was making.

item.title: Line preventing server from running
item.dc:creator: @_bool
item.description:
@_bool wrote:

FOG != Fog

case sensitivity m8

Read full topic

item.title: Line preventing server from running
item.dc:creator: @Fluffeh Fluffeh
item.description:
@Fluffeh wrote:

Do you not have an Error in a variable?
Im not good with this kind of stuff, just trying to help.

Read full topic
